# Abstract {.unnumbered .unlisted}

The goal of this study is to conduct thorough research on the use of ANOVA Crossover in randomized clinical trials related to physiotherapy and rehabilitation. Creating an application tutorial in the R environment is the primary goal.

**Key-words:** Quantitative Methods, ANOVA, Crossover Trials, Crossover ANOVA.

**How cite this project?**

Georgeto, S. M., & Rogers, P. (2024). Applying ANOVA in Crossover Trials. <https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/3RXF2>
